title: World leading 4K high-end smart TV solution (Support ATSC, ISDB-T, DVB-C/T)
technology_highlights: Support Dolby Vision, HDR 10 high dynamic display;
Support HDMI 2.0 6G full bandwidth signal input; Support 4K HDMI content protection HCDP2.2;
Support FHD encoding and provide high effiency video encoding technology allowing interaction of multi windows;
Support digital broadcoasting system ATSC, ISDB-T, DVB-C/T.
